channel.title: Client appearance update!(I only wanna change the layout of the client!)
channel.description:
I forgot how to change the name of a client when the client shows up! I checked pretty many files and still can't remember how to change the name it shows in top of the client!PLZ Help me remembering this 1 as i started from an (almost) blank client 'N' Source! FIGURED OUT!
But: How do i change the layout of a client??(not the sprites!) THANKS!

item.title: Client appearance update!(I only wanna change the layout of the client!)
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

Nope…I figured it out but there’s another problem!
How do i change client appearance?You know how it looks like…
What programs do i need for changing it please respond fast!

Read full topic
